channel.title: Help with item recoloring

item.title: Help with item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

You need to insert this into your clients “class8.java”. This files handles the custom items. Open the file and search “public static final Class8 method198”. insert it below the “class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);” or just below all the declarations. Hope i helped =/

Read full topic

@Hackerz wrote:

In your client folder open you class8.java now search for if(i ==

and above that add your item

SOME CLIENTS DON’T HAVE CUSTOM ITEMS ALREADY IN THEM

If thats the case then i dont know what to tell you

item.title: Help with item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

heres the code
if(i == ****)//item id
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;

class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;

class8.anIntArray156[1] = 10351;

were am i sopposed to put this

thanks
